# Ressources
* Best ressources are found in the reticulate vignettes: [Link](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/reticulate/index.html), in particular [this](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/reticulate/vignettes/versions.html)

# Managing python installation
```{r}
#| eval: false
library('reticulate')
py_discover_config()
py_config()
conda_list()
conda_version()
configure_environment()
conda_create('sbloggel')
conda_install('sbloggel', 'pandas')

miniconda_update()
use_condaenv('sbloggel')
conda_install('sbloggel', 'seaborn')
use_condaenv('base')
```
